name: Chi Feng
home__description: Self-motivated software developer, passionate about technical problems, creative thinker, and a supporter of diversity in technology. Experience across both frontend and backend stacks.
about__description: Hello, I'm Chi, a front-end software developer with a passion for crafting innovative solutions. I have experience in different programming languages including TypeScript/JavaScript, Python, Java, and more. I've also worked across various technology stacks including both front-end and server-side frameworks. Before entering the industry, I studied at Cornell Tech, nestled in the picturesque setting of Roosevelt Island, New York, where my research primarily focused on optimization and machine learning.
qualification_antra__l1: Engineered dynamic and responsive web applications using Angular, TypeScript, and NestJS.
qualification_antra__l2: Crafted reusable components, custom directives, and pipes to elevate the functionality of reactive forms.
qualification_antra__l3: Designed and optimized RESTful API routes and endpoints with NestJS.
qualification_antra__l4: Implemented lazy loading and route resolvers to significantly enhance app performance.
qualification_antra__l5: Developed authentication service and utilized MongoDB for scalable user data management.

qualification_amazon__l1: Designed and developed web application for Amazon's cloud gaming service with TypeScript, JavaScript, and React.
qualification_amazon__l2: Implemented automated testing to achieve continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) using Jest and Cypress.
qualification_amazon__l3: Leveraged Amazon API Gateway and AWS Lambda for API management, ensuring seamless data flow.
qualification_amazon__l4: Utilized AWS services including S3 and CloudWatch to monitor pipeline health.
qualification_amazon__l5: Worked across teams including engineers, designers, and project managers to deliver high quality features.
qualification_baici__l1: Developed a comprehensive community operations strategy, refining SOP to enhance user retention and engagement.
qualification_baici__l2: Managed over 2000 customers through phone and WeChat. Responsibilities included offering personalized study guidance, delivering post-class services, onboarding process for new customers, and organizing activities to foster community participation.
qualification_baici__l3: Gathered and analyzed customer feedback, leading to the establishment of a continuous improvement plan aimed at optimizing user satisfaction and overall community experience.
qualification_aero__l1: Developed a mathematical model to simulate local interaction of Unmanned Aerial Vehicle swarm.
qualification_aero__l2: Applied the developed model to present common steering behaviors of autonomous swarms to achieve complex flock tasks.
